trans-unit.source: Provides the event data for the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnected" /> and <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnected" /> events of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Fornece os dados de evento para o eventos <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnected" /> e <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnected" /> do controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager" />.

trans-unit.source: Using the capabilities of the Web Parts control set, it is possible to create a connection between two <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> or other server controls, with one control acting as the provider, and the other acting as the consumer of data.
trans-unit.target: Usando os recursos do conjunto de controle de Web Parts, é possível criar uma conexão entre dois <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> ou outros controles de servidor, com um controle que atua como o provedor e o outros atuando como o consumidor de dados.

trans-unit.source: To form a connection, the two controls must reside in a zone that inherits from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> class (such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone> control), and they must be designed correctly to share data through a common interface.
trans-unit.target: Para formar uma conexão, os dois controles devem residir em uma zona que herda o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> classe (como o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone> controle), e eles devem ser criados corretamente para compartilhar dados por meio de uma interface comum.

trans-unit.source: For details about Web Parts connections, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> and [Web Parts Connections Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98cfd0f-ebd6-4871-89d5-abbd2cdef67b).
trans-unit.target: Para obter detalhes sobre conexões de Web Parts, consulte <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> e [Web Parts Connections Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98cfd0f-ebd6-4871-89d5-abbd2cdef67b).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs> class passes event data to methods that use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventHandler> delegate to handle events.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs> classe transmite dados de evento para métodos que usam o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventHandler> delegado para manipular eventos.

trans-unit.source: There are two such connection-related methods that raise events and use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs> class to provide event data.
trans-unit.target: Há dois tais relacionadas à conexão métodos que geram eventos e usar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs> classe para fornecer dados de evento.

trans-unit.source: Both are members of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control.
trans-unit.target: Ambos são membros de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> controle.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartsConnected%2A> method raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnected> event after two server controls have successfully connected, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartsDisconnected%2A> method raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnected> event after two server controls have been disconnected.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartsConnected%2A> método gera o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnected> evento após dois controles de servidor se conectou com êxito e o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartsDisconnected%2A> método gera o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnected> evento após dois controles de servidor foi desconectados.

trans-unit.source: Developers can create custom event handler methods for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnected> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnected> events, and in those methods, they can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs> class to access details of a connection.
trans-unit.target: Os desenvolvedores podem criar eventos personalizados métodos do manipulador para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnected> e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnected> eventos, e esses métodos, eles podem usar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs> classe detalhes de acesso de uma conexão.

trans-unit.source: For example, a developer can declare the `OnWebPartsConnected` attribute on the `<asp:webpartmanager>` element, and assign to it a custom method name that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, um desenvolvedor pode declarar o `OnWebPartsConnected` atributo no `<asp:webpartmanager>` elemento e atribua a ele um nome de método personalizado que manipulará o evento.

trans-unit.source: In the custom handler method, developers can access the details of a connection by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs> object that is passed to the method as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: O método de manipulador personalizado, os desenvolvedores podem acessar os detalhes de uma conexão usando o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs> objeto que é passado ao método como um parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs> class has two overloads of the constructor.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs> classe tem duas sobrecargas do construtor.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.%23ctor%28System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> constructor is the default; it initializes the property values for the class.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.%23ctor%28System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> construtor é o padrão; ele inicializa os valores de propriedade para a classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.%23ctor%28System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> constructor calls the default constructor, and then it also initializes the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.Connection%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.%23ctor%28System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint%2CSystem.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> construtor chama o construtor padrão e, em seguida, ele também inicializa o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.Connection%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs> class has several properties, all of which refer to the essential aspects of a Web Parts connection.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs> classe tem várias propriedades, que se referem aos aspectos de uma conexão de Web Parts essenciais.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.Connection%2A> property refers to the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> object that represents the entire connection.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.Connection%2A> propriedade se refere a associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> objeto que representa a conexão inteira.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.Provider%2A> property references a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> or other server control acting as the provider in the connection, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.Consumer%2A> property references a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> or server control acting as the consumer.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.Provider%2A> referências de propriedade um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> ou outro controle de servidor que atua como o provedor de conexão e o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.Consumer%2A> referências de propriedade um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> ou controle de servidor que atua como o consumidor.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.ProviderConnectionPoint%2A> property references the connection's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint> object, while the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.ConsumerConnectionPoint%2A> property references the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint> object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.ProviderConnectionPoint%2A> a conexão faz referência a propriedade <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint> objeto, enquanto o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.ConsumerConnectionPoint%2A> referências de propriedade de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs" />.

trans-unit.source: The control acting as the provider.
trans-unit.target: O controle que age como o provedor.

trans-unit.source: The provider connection point.
trans-unit.target: O ponto de conexão do provedor.

trans-unit.source: The control acting as the consumer.
trans-unit.target: O controle que age como o consumidor.

trans-unit.source: The consumer connection point.
trans-unit.target: O ponto de conexão do consumidor.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs" /> class without requiring a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs" /> sem precisar de um objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" />.

trans-unit.source: This is the default constructor.
trans-unit.target: Esse é o construtor padrão.

trans-unit.source: It does not require a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> object.
trans-unit.target: Não é necessário um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The constructor initializes the values of its properties by assigning each of its connection-related parameter objects to the corresponding property.
trans-unit.target: O construtor inicializa os valores de suas propriedades, atribuindo cada um dos seus objetos de parâmetro de conexão relacionadas à propriedade correspondente.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> or server control acting as the provider.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> ou o controle do servidor que age como o provedor.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint" /> for the connection.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint" /> para a conexão.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> or server control acting as the consumer.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> ou o controle de servidor que age como o consumidor.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint" /> for the connection.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint" /> para a conexão.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" /> object.
trans-unit.target: O objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe usando o objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: This version of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor is used when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> object is available.
trans-unit.target: Esta versão do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> construtor é usado quando um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> objeto está disponível.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" /> object of the current connection.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" /> da conexão atual.

trans-unit.source: The current <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> object contains all the details of a Web Parts connection, including references to the provider control, the provider's connection point, the consumer control, and the consumer's connection point.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection> objeto contém todos os detalhes de uma conexão de Web Parts, incluindo referências para o controle de provedor, ponto de conexão do provedor, o controle de consumidor e ponto de conexão do consumidor.

trans-unit.source: For details about Web Parts connections, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint>, and [Web Parts Connections Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98cfd0f-ebd6-4871-89d5-abbd2cdef67b).
trans-unit.target: Para obter detalhes sobre conexões de Web Parts, consulte <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint>, e [Web Parts Connections Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98cfd0f-ebd6-4871-89d5-abbd2cdef67b).

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control that is acting as the consumer in the connection.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> que está agindo como o consumidor na conexão.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> acting as the consumer.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> atuando como o consumidor.

trans-unit.source: A connection between controls in a Web Parts zone requires one control to act as the provider and another to act as the consumer.
trans-unit.target: Uma conexão entre os controles em uma zona de Web Parts requer um controle para atuar como o provedor e outro para atuar como o consumidor.

trans-unit.source: Each control must also have a connection point defined; in the consumer's case, the connection point must be a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint> object.
trans-unit.target: Cada controle também deve ter um ponto de conexão definido; no caso do consumidor, o ponto de conexão deve ser um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint> objeto.

trans-unit.source: For details about Web Parts connections, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint>, and [Web Parts Connections Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98cfd0f-ebd6-4871-89d5-abbd2cdef67b).
trans-unit.target: Para obter detalhes sobre conexões de Web Parts, consulte <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint>, e [Web Parts Connections Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98cfd0f-ebd6-4871-89d5-abbd2cdef67b).

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint" /> object of the current connection.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint" /> da conexão atual.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint" /> of the current connection.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint" /> da conexão atual.

trans-unit.source: A connection between controls in a Web Parts zone requires one control to act as the provider and another to act as the consumer.
trans-unit.target: Uma conexão entre os controles em uma zona de Web Parts requer um controle para atuar como o provedor e outro para atuar como o consumidor.

trans-unit.source: Each control must also have a connection point defined; in the consumer's case, the connection point must be a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint> object.
trans-unit.target: Cada controle também deve ter um ponto de conexão definido; no caso do consumidor, o ponto de conexão deve ser um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint> objeto.

trans-unit.source: For details about Web Parts connections, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint>, and [Web Parts Connections Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98cfd0f-ebd6-4871-89d5-abbd2cdef67b).
trans-unit.target: Para obter detalhes sobre conexões de Web Parts, consulte <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint>, e [Web Parts Connections Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98cfd0f-ebd6-4871-89d5-abbd2cdef67b).

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control that is acting as the provider in the connection.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o controle <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> que está agindo como o provedor na conexão.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> acting as the provider.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> atuando como o provedor.

trans-unit.source: A connection between controls in a Web Parts zone requires one control to act as the provider and another to act as the consumer.
trans-unit.target: Uma conexão entre os controles em uma zona de Web Parts requer um controle para atuar como o provedor e outro para atuar como o consumidor.

trans-unit.source: Each control must also have a connection point defined; in the provider's case, the connection point must be a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint> object.
trans-unit.target: Cada controle também deve ter um ponto de conexão definido; no caso do provedor, o ponto de conexão deve ser um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint> objeto.

trans-unit.source: For details about Web Parts connections, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint>, and [Web Parts Connections Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98cfd0f-ebd6-4871-89d5-abbd2cdef67b).
trans-unit.target: Para obter detalhes sobre conexões de Web Parts, consulte <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint>, e [Web Parts Connections Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98cfd0f-ebd6-4871-89d5-abbd2cdef67b).

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint" /> object of the current connection.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint" /> da conexão atual.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint" /> of the current connection.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint" /> da conexão atual.

trans-unit.source: A connection between controls in a Web Parts zone requires one control to act as the provider and another to act as the consumer.
trans-unit.target: Uma conexão entre os controles em uma zona de Web Parts requer um controle para atuar como o provedor e outro para atuar como o consumidor.

trans-unit.source: Each control must also have a connection point defined; in the provider's case, the connection point must be a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint> object.
trans-unit.target: Cada controle também deve ter um ponto de conexão definido; no caso do provedor, o ponto de conexão deve ser um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint> objeto.

trans-unit.source: For details about Web Parts connections, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint>, and [Web Parts Connections Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98cfd0f-ebd6-4871-89d5-abbd2cdef67b).
trans-unit.target: Para obter detalhes sobre conexões de Web Parts, consulte <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnection>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionPoint>, e [Web Parts Connections Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98cfd0f-ebd6-4871-89d5-abbd2cdef67b).
